name: Nekonoko Adventure
description:
NEKONOKO ADVENTURE is a momentum platformer where you cannot jump and air control is thin on the ground.

inspired by the above famicase art by nekonoko the artist, who also made the character. you can follow him on twitter.

(we actually originally were making this game for the "a game by its cover" jam, but missed the deadline 😭)

game by sam

songs by ben

itch.io page art by sadie

and i think we all did a pretty good job.

some of the game runs unbearably slow in-browser, so i would say download the game on windows for the best experience.
